scene_description_enriched: A procession is depicted, with several figures carrying a reliquary adorned with a crown. The central figure, a man with a halo, wears a pink robe and carries one end of a pole supporting the reliquary. To his right, a bishop in a golden cope and mitre holds a red object, possibly a feather or a palm frond, and a liturgical implement. To the left of the central figure, three other individuals, two women and a man, are visible, also supporting the reliquary. The background is a deep blue with a repeating geometric pattern. The scene is framed by a decorative border with red, white, and blue bands and gold ornamentation.
